amendment.description: To restore funding for nondiscretionary Byrne grants to a level of $500,000,000.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 32 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 6.
Amendment SA 32 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S1059-1061; text: CR S1059) To restore funding for nondiscretionary Byrne grants to a level of $500,000,000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 32 proposed by Senator Harkin.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 32 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 6.
